name: Sofia Amaral
info: • 简体中文名: 索菲亚·阿马拉尔
detail: Dr. Sofia Amaral is a scientist who is involved in the chronon field manipulation project. She was convinced by Paul Serene to help with this project, but was quickly locked in the cascading field. She is found frozen in time by Jack Joyce and Kate during the events of Quantum Break; she is considered by both of them to be the solution to unraveling the mystery surrounding the Monarch Corporation and solving the time stutter resulting from the use of the chronon field.
